programme.title: The Incredible Shrinking Gummy.
programme.desc: A weird gizmo in Granny Peters’ lab winds up shrinking Gummy down to a tiny size, and he must cope with a suddenly-HUGE world... while trying to contact pals Harry and Kala and figure out some way to get back to normal.

programme.title: Marathon Hitch
programme.desc: IT is the running race and Don and Colonel are trying out everything possible to win. Ans when the rat trio enter the scene, the race becomes a war. But, as the wise say, slow and steady wins the race. There is an unexpected winner. And our heroes go back to their daily race.

programme.title: ATHITHI DEVO BHAVA
programme.desc: Chai Raja has taught Sundar a valuable lesson that customers are like god. Cashing on this opportunity Basha walks into the hotel pretending to be a customer. Basha comes into the shop in all kind of disguises dressed like a pot-bellied Carnatic singer soon caught by Sundar, as a suited up officer soon caught by Sundar and at last as a sadhu making Sundar do all sorts of silly and insane chores/services. At last when the customer asks Sundar to massage his limbs, Sundar finds a peculiar fifth leg (Bashas tail) which makes Sundar lose all control and he goes mad. It is sheer madness in the teashop.

programme.title: Library Trouble
programme.desc: Don and Colonel are in the library. And the library has rules – of silence and composure. But with the rats trying their level best to irritate don, the library is as noisy and dirty as a market place in no time!!

programme.title: GLOVE OF THE SOUTH
programme.desc: Negu is thrilled to learn there is a Glove of the South hidden on the Guardians’ island. He sends a big-eyed mutant, The Finder, to find the glove and bring it to him. The Guardians try to stop The Finder, but fail. Luckily, when Negu dons the Glove of the South, it tickles him mercilessly! The Glove of the South was a trick, invented by the Elders!

programme.title: Flash Blind
programme.desc: Don rips apart the parcel and out comes A Brand New Camera! Don is on a clicking spree. He makes colonel pose and ends up clicking Ballu. From friends to enemies to the innards of his tummy, he captures it all.

programme.title: CRUNCHY SHAADI
programme.desc: A newly married couple straight from the mandap is passing by Hotel Kelifornia when the bride still in the wedding dress (with ghoonghat) smells the yummy fried murukku and the piping hot tea. She wants to try and her young and chivalrous husband would give his beautiful wife anything she wants. The couple comes in and the husband is all grandiose personified to impress his wife. Sundar is all ready to please them. And our little Basha finds this the right opportunity to grab the crispy murukkus. He makes sure that none of the food which Sundar carries, goes to the couple. And Basha comes up with crazy ways including disguising as the groom (with sehera) to grab and eat the food from the brides plate before she could even smell them. The bride is angered by the groom who is incapable of feeding her. The poor groom is trying everything possible to win the heart of his young wife. It is madness inside the hotel and Sundar is going nuts. At last the bride is fed up. She whacks the hell out of the useless groom. Basha now changes his plan and does things in such a way that the groom thinks that Sundar has been messing with him. The groom is furious and exposes Sundar to his bride and then throws him away. Then the chivalrous groom takes a huge plate full of snacks and offers it to his wife. Awww it is love all over again!! And the couple walk away in full on romance. With a crying Sundar looking at them. Basha is chewing the fag end of the yummy kacha-kela-bhajiya!

programme.title: Kites Away!
programme.desc: It all happens for a kite! Don wants it… the rats wont let it go. And in this tug of war, an angry and frustrated King Chomp is funnily pulled into. It is a bad time for the rats and a very bad time for Don and Colonel.

programme.title: The Christmas Gift
programme.desc: A poor but loving couple secretly sells their most precious things to spend a happy Christmas and buys gifts for each of them.

programme.title: ALLY-GATOR
programme.desc: Once a spooky-looking biologist comes to the teashop to have tea. He opens a box and starts doing some things into it (arranging eggs, or feathers or studying specimens). He is also having his tea. Once he finishes the drink, the old man leaves. But Sundar notices a thing fall from his box. By the time Sundar runs to the door, the man is gone. The thing looks like a shiny stone. Sundar is about to add the stone to his box of trinkets when Basha swoops in and snatches the box away. Sundar chases after Basha and they collide and the box flies open and the shiny stone falls out. Much to Sundars wonder (as well as Basha who sneaks up), the stone starts to crack. It is actually an egg. It cracks open and out pops a mischievous little alligator who gets a giggle out of messingg with the customers. The baby-alligator is literally after Sundar calling him Mama. A thunderous Chai Raja orders Sundar to get his alligator under control- which is made even more impossible thanks to Bashas meddling. But the twist happens when the baby-dragon starts calling Basha Papa! The shop looks straight out of a disastrous war movie when much to Sundars and Bashas relief, the absent minded biologist turns up and in a trice, tames the naughty alligator. But all doesnt end well as Sundars single sigh of relief is all that it takes to bring down the teetering shop to a pile of wood and leaves!

programme.title: CHOCOLATE CHAI
programme.desc: Chai Raja wants to swish up a new kind of recipe for teatime in order attract more customers. Sundar who has snuck in a tasty bar of chocolate is trying to sneak a bite as he goes about his chores in the kitchen. However thanks to his clumsiness or an altercation with Basha, Sundars chocolate bar ends up in Chai Rajas experimental kettle. Chai Raja is extremely angry at first but when he gives it a taste, he realizes that hes hit the jackpot. The customers cant get enough of the chocolate Chai and by word of mouth (shown comically like a Chinese whisper leading right upto the a famous chef) , news of his creation reaches the ears of a famous Chef. The Chef turns up at hotel Kelifornia and on tasting it wants the recipe for himself. He offers Chai Raja a lot of cash but Chai Raja refuses. But the Chef not ready to give up, decides to steal the recipe. He ropes in Basha and tries to get Sundar too to spill the beans. Its utter confusion as Sundar muddles up the Chefs ploy and Basha gets distracted by the fries far too often for the Chefs good.

programme.title: The Race
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Airborne
programme.desc: Task for the day: Building a plane. Spanners, bolts and wrenches fly in the air as Don gives instructions to Colonel on building a plane.

programme.title: Bubble Cars
programme.desc: As Deedee and Nino were wondering what Charlie got the twins for their birthday, Sandy whizzes past in a brand new pedal car. Boris got one too, but he doesn’t want his to get dirty at all. So he decides not to use it at all even though he misses all the fun Sandy is having. Mewmew and Sandy even have a race across town. Boris even declines a chance to race, but is entirely sceptical about it as he doesn’t even want a splash of mud to fall on it. He is even more worried when he sees Sandy’s car not working. Deedee tries to help by magically trying to create a bubble guard around Boris’s car, but the spell falls on Sandy’s car instead. Now no one can even touch the car, let alone repair it. Boris vouches to allow Sandy use his car as he acknowledges that it was his undoing that led to the creation of the bubble in the first place. Sandy is overjoyed and promises to be extra careful. So careful that Mewmew can even beat her by running on his ears. Deedee tells Boris to prove to Sandy that she can use the car faster, so Boris races with Mewmew and accidentally splashes mud over his face, but then is happy he does and enjoys the fun. He races so fast that he pops the bubble guard over Sandy’s car by crashing into it. Charlie sets down to fix the cars and the twins are driving them in a jiffy, giggling all the way.

programme.title: ZoonicornsIntheZooniverse
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: The Magic Wand
programme.desc: The van of the magician is passing by the GrandPAs house as Hoodie grabs the magicians wand unnoticed and heads towards the house.

programme.title: MEOW HELP YOU?
programme.desc: It is not a good morning for Sundar as he is messing up the orders. Then a very sophisticated apron clad thin wiry man comes to the shop. Within seconds, he convinces Chai Raja of his efficiency and skill both in and around the kitchen and is instantly employed. Chai Raja is super impressed and the next moment, Sundar is kicked out of the shop. Sundar tears his hair- he has to get rid of the man- but the man despite his suave look is extremely streetwise and fights dirty. Basha meanwhile too finds the man too cunning for his liking when he gets whacked a few times and agrees to team up with Sundar to put him out of commission. Together they manage to reveal the mans actual nature to Chai Raja and the customers and gets him ousted. As for their alliance, that goes out the window the second Sundar is presented back with his towel- the mark of his employment. The two chase and the chai pours as routine.

programme.title: The Heroes Path
programme.desc: Xia is bored because it’s been days since Negu sent a Mutant when he finds the instructions for the “Heroes’ Path”. Pai and April laugh at what they think is a silly game for kids, but Xia completes each step with great excitement. When one of the instructions is to steal the Glove of the North, Xia begins to suspect something. Thanks to his quick wits he manages to save the Glove of the North and find out who was behind the “Heroes’ Path” – a mutant fox, sent by Negu.

programme.title: Paint Job
programme.desc: It is makeover time. Paint, brushes, brooms and rollers, they have it all. But the mice want the walls in a shade of red, and Don and Colonel have decided that it has to be blue. To solve the confusion, Colonel cements the mice’s house shut. What would the mice do in return?

programme.title: Super Gummy
programme.desc: Accidentally convinced that he’s a super hero, Gummy becomes Mind-O-Man – and sets out to help out everybody... to the point of driving them CRAZY!

programme.title: Slimey Smlugs
programme.desc: Sneevils newest pet Smlugs are destroying all of the plumbing in Smightyland. The Super Six must smlug drive them out before its too late.

programme.title: New Point of View - Pancake
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Star to Star
programme.desc: Hey kids! Emmie our cute little elephant loves dancing & sings good english songs. Its time to enjoy the pirate song & more with Emmie! Sway and listen to great kids song like Pirate song , Rain, Catch a wave and hula hoop! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats!

programme.title: Rainy Blues
programme.desc: Relentless rain and a hot cup of black tea, what more could Don ask for. Raindrops at home? As Don and Colonel take different measures to seal the cracks. Cement, tarpaulin sheets and umbrellas! The trio make sure that it isn’t an easy task.

programme.title: The Big Wave
programme.desc: Sneevil and Biggs set off a Smightynami wave that threatens to wash away Smightyland. Dude has to ride the big one and save the day.

programme.title: Super Hero Don
programme.desc: Don get super powers when he gets thrown to another planet. And when he returns, it is a tough time for Larry Marly and Charly. Now it is the reign of Don - the super hero. But, it all changes when the rats get super powers!! gosh! What will happen to Don now???

programme.title: All Through the House
programme.desc: Hey kids! Sway and listen to popular #nurseryrhymes like count it out #123Song, Easter bunny, rain and many more with our pink diva Emmie the elephant! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats! These rhymes are best during kids playing time!

programme.title: Party
programme.desc: GrandPa has gone out of town for some days and Cat has planned a cool party with the neighbouring cats. All he has to do is to get Dunky out of the house for some hours and continue his party.

programme.title: The Low Price of Fame
programme.desc: Team Racing is introduced. Speed, X and Annalise are on one team. When Analise is made team captain they must get over their differences for the good of the team. Before the race Annalise is contacted by the Shadowy woman who tells her that a saboteur will enter the race and attack the Mach 6. She orders Annalise to aid the saboteur. It seems like Annalise might but at the last moment takes the hit and saves Speed and the Mach 6. While investigating where the saboteur came from, Speed and the gang discover a tear in the virtual track. The saboteurs got in through the tear, which leaves the school vulnerable to attack. Conor patches the tear but they have to find the source. Since the virtual track is temporarily closed the Racer Academy is invited to race at the Alpha Academy. Tipped off by Speed Sr., Speed and Conor investigate and find the source of the virtual tear. They chalk it up to competitive sabotoge, but we find out that the Alpha Academy is connected to the Shadowy Organization.

programme.title: Crosswalk Harry
programme.desc: Harry gets a job as a crosswalk guard and winds up taking his duties VERY seriously, to the point of nearly driving Gummy crazy when he wants to just cross the street.

programme.title: Heungboo and Nolboo
programme.desc: Mischievous UGo takes all of his parents property and kicks his younger brother GoGo out of the house. Meanwhile, a swallow bird brings a gourd seed to the eaves of a kind-hearted GoGo house, and soon, gourds containing gold and silver treasures opens on the roof of the GoGos house.

programme.title: Prima donna
programme.desc: The twins help a girl become a movie star, but she becomes a primadonna.

programme.title: Just A Day’s Work
programme.desc: It is just a usual day in Don’s life and everything goes on as usual. The rat trio is at their nasty best. And Don and Colonel are at their wit’s end. With the entire house going wild, it seems our guys can’t imagine a single day without each other.

programme.title: CHICKEN!
programme.desc: To earn his Orange Underbelt, Pai thinks he’s going to fight Xia in a chicken costume. But he ends up having to fight Negu’s giant chicken mutant, which can fire toxic eggs!

programme.title: Dinosaur crossing
programme.desc: A young prehistoric boy is struggling with a dinosaur that in its frantic race threatens to overwhelm all. With the help of a chameleon, the twins will help the boy to resolve the situation.

programme.title: Shout
programme.desc: Maple keeps forgetting to use appropriate voice levels when interacting with others. Outside Voices vs. Inside Voice. (Learn by practicing to) Use the proper volume in the appropriate environments

programme.title: The Fast Track
programme.desc: When Zile Zazic is released on house arrest and brought back to the school, a new Security Team is brought in to protect him from the Shadowy Organization. Speed eventually realizes that the Security Team is actually part of the Shadowy Organization sent in to get a scan of the Mach 6. In thwarting the Shadow Orgs plans, Speed discovers that there is another missing piece to the Mach 6s engine.

programme.title: How To Meet a Spoon
programme.desc: Odessa is scared of meeting new people when she goes off to camp, so the Zoonicorns use a flashback to remind her that she knows how to make new friends – and that its fun! When you’re afraid of trying something new, you can practice until it is not scary anymore.

programme.title: Yogi Don
programme.desc: One fine day a courier comes for Don – a yoga training guide. Now Don is all yogic and spiritual. Phew!! The trio just can’t take all this. And when they get into action, Don sees all seven heavens from the yoga mat itself.

programme.title: Whoops Elujah
programme.desc: When Ene messes up building a playset, it turns out to be even more fun than the original, Pancake learns a lesson about “When the world gives you lemons....”. Mistakes are just unexpected surprises.

programme.title: Day At The Spa
programme.desc: Don and Colonel want to pamper themselves. Yes!! a complete spa treatment. And when Larry Marly and Charly enter the scene, spa becomes a punishment for Don and Colonel. But when they are at their wits end, the dogs make sure that, the naughty rats learn a lesson. How does the twist happen??

programme.title: A Star Is Jumped
programme.desc: Odessa learns to leap over stars by starting on low ones,Persistence pays off, especially when you learn from each step along the way, building up to the final goal.

programme.title: The Beginning
programme.desc: Speed has just been reunited with his father, when Zile Zazic attacks, stealing the Mach 6. Speed, Speed Sr. and the gang get the car back and defeat Zile. Speed Sr., not knowing why theyre after the car again, goes underground to investigate. Meanwhile Connor gets a strange reading off the Mach 6. Soon they discover the car has a strange anomaly - it jumps forward in space. When they start experimenting with the car they get attacked again and realize this "jump" function has something to do with why Zile was after the car.

programme.title: THE WATERFALL OF LIFE
programme.desc: The balance and harmony of the Yan World are knocked out of whack when Negu sends a giant mutant toad to plug up the Waterfall of Life. The Guardians have to drive off the toad and repair the stone lotus through which the water flows. Balance and harmony are restored!

programme.title: Fix it!
programme.desc: The twins visit a world where everything is falling apart, where they meet the frantic "fix-it team

programme.title: Banding Together
programme.desc: When Maple joins the Zoonicorns’ band, her off-kilter playing disrupts the entire Zooniverse. Working together/Not giving up.

programme.title: GREASE IS THE WORD
programme.desc: Durian Grey revives the dark art of Chumpling generation while Ralph struggles with feelings of intellectual inadequacy

programme.title: The baby dromedary
programme.desc: The twins help a little pharaoh to find his lost pet, a baby dromedary.

programme.title: The hidden champion
programme.desc: Ragoo brings in a small seashell necklace and the twins find themselves under the sea, where they meet Finny, a little fish whos too shy to play with the other fish.

programme.title: Robo-Gummy
programme.desc: Finding himself over-committed to too many things, Gummy orders a few duplicate robots of himself... who winds up in the end causing more trouble than they’re worth!

programme.title: I Want To Be An Energetic Model
programme.desc: The friends find out about the camping car model contest from Dada. When they learn that this years grand prize is a "camping car," both Scot and Duda jump at the chance to be Pinkars model. However, there can only be one model, and the model must be energetic and healthy. So, Scot and Duda decide to compete for the position. Scot receives rigorous physical training from Piggy and Puggy. On the other hand, Duda takes a more fun and moderate route. Finally, the day of "the most energetic competition" arrives. Duda appears refreshed and excited; however, Scot is nowhere to be seen. The friends find him sleeping, totally exhausted from the fierce training he underwent. It looks like Duda will become Pinkars default model.

programme.title: Lets Get Kraken
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Lost Lamp
programme.desc: Aladdin discovers his mother has sold the lamp for money. He rushes to the lamp sellers stall when Jamillah arrives, causing a mess everywhere. When Aladdin tells her that Genie has been sold she hatches a plan and dresses up as a noble woman with Aladdin as her servant in order to get him back. Whilst she distracts the lamp seller Aladdin tries to find Genie except theres one problem - there are hundreds of lamps! The lamp seller sees through their disguise and banishes them away but they return and manage to get the lamp only to have the Grand Vizier walk away with it. Jamillah tricks him by trading a pocket torch she has from home, getting the lamp back and saving Genie.

programme.title: Snoring
programme.desc: Granny Peters’ loud snoring winds up keeping Gummy, Harry and Kala awake – and trying whatever schemes they can think of to somehow stop it!

programme.title: Slimey Smlugs
programme.desc: Sneevils newest pet Smlugs are destroying all of the plumbing in Smightyland. The Super Six must "smlug drive" them out before its too late.

programme.title: Kitten up a Tree
programme.desc: When Gummy comes upon a kitten stuck up a tree, he and the gang become increasingly caught up in trying figure out ways to get it back down.

programme.title: Coach Dad
programme.desc: Fred’s Dad wants to spend more time with him. He becomes the new gym coach at school. Unfortunately, he is so tough on the kids Fred has to use Friday to make fake notes from their parents, until Fred and Brains are the only ones left doing the tough workout.

programme.title: Shopping Mad
programme.desc: Its shopping time! Don and Colonel move the trolley up the aisles, little do they know that the three mice are peeping from between Don’s bag. Chaos unfolds in the mall!

programme.title: Merry Go Bush
programme.desc: Pancake isn’t taking care of his new pet fish appropriately, even though he’s trying super-hard. When he arrives in the Zoonivese and tries to help Ene take care of a Merry-Go-Bush, he learns to that there’s a right way, and a wrong way, to care for something (by following the rules), no matter the good intentions

programme.title: Flash Blind
programme.desc: Don rips apart the parcel and out comes A Brand New Camera! Don is on a clicking spree. He makes colonel pose and ends up clicking Ballu. From friends to enemies to the innards of his tummy, he captures it all.

programme.title: Castle Down
programme.desc: Sneevil and Biggs dig tunnels underneath the Castle that bring it crashing down underground. Melody and Nardy must face their fears and work together to bring the Castle back up to Smightyland.

programme.title: An Alien Visit
programme.desc: It’s a nice cold night and Keet is resting on the terrace of the house enjoying the night stars. Suddenly a small space ship crash lands on the terrace and a cute little alien the same size of Keet comes out.

programme.title: Tommy’s Got Talent
programme.desc: Charlie and the twins are practising for Mayor De Pfeffle’s talent contest. Deedee isn’t contesting as she didn’t get any time to practice. The twins have a tough time dancing in step with Uncle Charlie’s drum beat. Deedee tries to help them with a remembering spell, but Nino points out that it wouldn’t be fair to use magic in a contest. So Deedee and Nino walk along wishing the twins are able to perfect their act in time. Mewmew si struggling with a juggling act, so Deedee tries to help by conjuring a catching spell, but Nino reminds her it’s wrong just in time. Luciano haughtily sings as he walks. But Deedee and Nino hear an even more beautiful tune emanating from Tommy Prickles house. But Tommy is not too confident to sing in the presence of others. So Deedee comes up with a non-magic way to help. Happy at what Deedee suggests, Tommy decides to enroll. The fabulous prize is Tiggy’s very own specially made jelly. The winner is decided by who gets the highest ovation as measured on the clap-o-meter. Charlie and the twins perform outstandingly, so does Mewmew the juggling rabbit, Luciano’s opera all of whom get loud ovations. Finally it is Tommy prickles turn, but he isn’t able to keep his eyes closed like Deedee suggested him to, making his singing come to an abrupt stop. Deedee asks the audience if they could close their eyes to help Tommy sing. That was all Tommy needed to sing so very melodiously. The clap-o-meter does a full spin and points to the highest score ever. Tommy is declared the winner of Mayor De Pfeffle’s talent contest, that too without magic a wee bit.

programme.title: Airborne
programme.desc: Task for the day: Building a plane. Spanners, bolts and wrenches fly in the air as Don gives instructions to Colonel on building a plane.

programme.title: The Magic Factory – Hansel & Gretel Case 2
programme.desc: The fairytale detective SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the story of HANSEL and GRETEL, having been called out by GRETEL. When they arrive, the detective discovers that it has been a year since the witch fell into the oven and the story ended happily. HANSEL and GRETEL’s lives are now happy and prosperous, thanks to the treasure they took from the WITCH. But then GRETEL bought a packet of cakes in which there was an invitation to visit the Magic Factory, a wonderful place full of promises and all kinds of sweet things. Despite his sister’s opposition, HANSEL went to the magic factory. But that was three days ago and HANSEL has still not returned. What mysteries are concealed within that magic factory?

programme.title: 1,2,3… Smile~
programme.desc: Duda discovers Dadas digital camera. Suddenly, he becomes hooked on taking photos. Scot shows up thinking they are going on a picnic. But, he finds out that they are going swimming in the lake instead. Ashamed of not knowing how to swim, Scot tries to practice in a kiddie pool when no one is around. Unfortunately, Duda captures Scots embarrassing moment on camera. Afraid that Duda will show the photo to others, Scot is determined to delete it at all costs. After losing his boat to Duda in a bet, Scot becomes frantic when he sees his friends taking a ride on it with Duda and his camera. Without thinking, Scot jumps into the lake to go after them. Will Scot be okay?

programme.title: You Don’t Say
programme.desc: PANCAKE and ODESSA’S friendship is strained when the young otter unknowingly offends Odessa. In the Zooniverse, Pancake learns a lesson when he and the Zoonicorns picnic in Echo Canyon where hurtful words which turn into irritating little creatures, Words can hurt.

programme.title: The Magic Arp – The 12 Dancing Princesses
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant, FO, travel into the story of the 12 DANCING PRINCESSES, by the Brothers Grimm, having been called out by their father. The 12 PRINCESSES have mysteriously disappeared, as has BRUNO, a retired soldier who had been sent by the KING to spy on his daughters. SANDRA and FO will carry out an in-depth investigation and will find the PRINCESSES in a magic underground world. But the 12 PRINCESSES have remained frozen in the middle of a dance, due to the theft of the MAGIC HARP, which gave life to that world. SANDRA and FO will have to find the magic harp and return it to its place, in order to bring the 12 PRINCESSES back to life

programme.title: A Book for a Book
programme.desc: Cat is sick of Keet winning all the time. He runs through the newspapers and sees an ad of a book ”10 ways to catch a parrot”.

programme.title: Frequent Flyer
programme.desc: Bags packed, Don and Colonel are all set to fly. Little do they know who are hiding amidst their ironed shirts. Charly Marly and Lary continue to steal food, messing things up for Don and Colonel. Even up in the air, the chaotic scene doesn’t change. To add on to this, guess who is on the next seat? Ballu!!!

programme.title: BIG BUNNY
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to prepare a big feast. Pai sees this as his chance to impress the Elders and earn a new weapon to replace his Mystic Stick. But when he goes to collect the rare striped carrot (a crucial ingredient for his dish), he’s attacked by a Giant Bunny Mutant sent by Negu. His Mystic Stick helps him defeat the Mutant, so he’s content with his weapon…for now.

programme.title: Assaf The Magician – Aladdin
programme.desc: On this occasion, SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the tale of “Aladdin and the Magic Lamp”. The Sultan, the PRINCESS’s father, requires their detective services, as the evil magician ASSAF has returned and has stolen ALADDIN’s lamp. Not content with this, the perfidious magician has ordered the GENIE kill ALADDIN and then take his palace, with the PRINCESS inside, and transport it to his lair, in the distant Atlas Mountains. SANDRA will face the most powerful magician in the Thousand and One Nights with her only weapon: her ingenuity.

programme.title: Beach Fight
programme.desc: Its Dunky’s day off as he packs a small basket and heads to the beach .He starts making a sand castle and is very happy with it…

programme.title: The Jokester
programme.desc: Zaps silly pranks on his friends go too far and he finds himself all alone to fight Sneevil. A hilarious dance off between Zap and Biggs will determine who will get control of the Smighty Stones.

programme.title: Los laberintos del destino
programme.desc: Las familias de los pequeños Sveta y Pasha son muy unidas. Inesperadamente ellos quedan huérfanos.

programme.desc: Las familias de los pequeños Sveta y Pasha son muy unidas. Inesperadamente ellos quedan huérfanos.

programme.desc: Ana y su marido tenían un matrimonio feliz, cuando ella se entera de que él tiene una amante

programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?"

programme.title: Soul Detective
programme.desc: "An officer from the underworld joins forces with a policeman to track down evil spirits that have escaped to the mortal realm. Together, they explore the good and evil of human nature. This drama combines traditional and modern elements to bring a new fantasy experience to the audience. "

programme.title: Its In Our Nature
programme.desc: A million wildlife species are facing the threat of extinction. But why does this matter to a tiny city state like Singapore? What do we stand to lose if our wildlife go extinct? Host Lam Shushan comes face to face with some of the rarest creatures in the world and meets the tenacious frontliners who are racing to save our native wildlife from extinction.

programme.title: Incredible Tales Sr 7
programme.desc: Hosted by Utt, Incredible Tales returns for Season 7, featuring more ghoulish stories of paranormal encounters from Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand and Philippines. Incredible Tales is all about ghost stories told through generations, crossing boundaries of culture and language. Stories that generate intrigue, fascination, and fear.

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Crave
programme.desc: Warning: do not watch Crave on an empty stomach. Because we’ll have you craving a creamy scoop of ice cream bedded on a crispy waffle. Or really, really needing to crunch into juicy fried chicken right now. Hosted by Charlotte Mei, the runner-up of Eat List Star, Crave finds out what gets celebrities salivating – roti prata, roast meats, sushi, satay, salted egg ice cream, buah keluak, and even an English-style big breakfast! Our celebrities’ cravings know no bounds, and anything from local to Japanese to Mediterranean fare is fair game – as long as they crave it. And there’s a little special by Charlotte. On every show, she will cook a dish – guaranteed to make you crave for it!

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

Law of the Timber -1941
programme.desc: The H&L Lumber Company headed by Henry Lorimer and his daughter "Perry", receives a huge national defense order, and prepares to cut the dangerous Antler Valley tract. Eastern dude John Gordon applies for a lumberjack's job and Lorimer hires him. Soon, a series of accidents occur, topped by a forest fire of unknown origin, in which Lorimer is killed. Perry decides to carry on in her father's place, despite the objections of camp manager Barnes, who covets the company. The storehouse, where the dynamite needed to clear an avalanche is stored, explodes and Barnes blames Gordon. The latter has some cartridge cases used by the rifleman to explode the storehouse, and Barnes instructs his henchman Hodge Mason to get the evidence and kill Gordon. Perry overhears and attempts to stop them, but Barnes knocks her unconscious and puts her in the cab of a runaway train. Unable to keep Mason from reaching the plunger to set off an explosion to wreck the train, Gordon boards the speeding engine and races it over the danger spot ahead of the explosion. The engine and a few cars of lumber get through, and Perry is able to deliver the lumber order on schedule. Mason and Barnes are apprehended and Perry learns that Gordon is really John Gordon Hamilton, son of her late father's

programme.title: Guest Herb Frazier
programme.desc: It's not often thought of our Gullah Geechee ancestors as conservatives, but when you think about it, that's how they lived. With traditional skills and practices from West Africa, they used their community and daily way of living to be self-sustaining and self-sufficient. Those time honored skills of independence and strength also were rooted in the characteristics of fierce loyalty and patriotism. Our ancestors were built with all of the survival skills that they needed to to survive and thrive. Join our conversation with Herb Frazier, journalist and co-author of Sleeping with the Ancestors.

programme.title: Horror High 2020 Tyler J. Case
programme.desc: A monster lurks around a high school in the hypnotized town of Willow Hills and picks off tardy students one by one. Now it is up to an unlikely group of teens to put an end to the terror that has plagued many...

programme.title: Lake Terror
programme.desc: Remington has escaped the evil cabin but now the evil continues to follow him, wreaking havoc wherever he goes. Meanwhile, Chloe and Revel look for a missing sister that went to the evil cabin in the previous installment. The two meet Vincent, a failing TV host, to help psychically contact the missing sister. That's when a gunshot rings out in the night and the three meet Remington. Now they all must battle for their lives against the evil that pursues Remington to once and for all lock the evil away for good...

programme.title: Krampus 2: El Diablo Regresa
programme.desc: Cinco años después del asesinato de su esposa y la desaparición de su hija, el ex policía Jeremy Duffin es traído de vuelta para ayudar en la caza de un monstruo de Yuletide que castiga a los niños que han sido «traviesos». A medida que el monstruo se vuelve más errático e impredecible, Jeremy descubre la verdad sobre la desaparición de su hija y el destino que le ha deparado una fuente improbable. ¿Podrá Jeremy acabar finalmente con la pesadilla del monstruo navideño que ha aterrorizado a este pueblo durante años?

programme.title: Contención
programme.desc: ¿Qué ocurre cuando estalla una epidemia y no se sabe nada? Puede ocurrir cualquier cosa. Poco a poco, los residentes se dan cuenta de que todos morirán a menos que se unan...

programme.title: Poltergeist Americano
programme.desc: Horribles visiones atormentan a Taryn cuando ella, su hermano y sus compañeros de universidad se mudan a una vieja e infame casa. Entonces, sus sangrientas alucinaciones se vuelven demasiado reales...

programme.title: Amor Interés y Muerte
programme.desc: La ambición es la causa por la que unos padres obligan a su hija menor a casarse con un hombre de 50 años para asegurar un futuro lleno de comodidades, sin embargo no contaban con que las cosas no saldrían como lo tenían planeado.

programme.title: Catemaco: Magia y Misterio
programme.desc: Una familia normal va de vacaciones a Catemaco, Michoacan un pueblo famoso y pintoresco en Mexico. Todo marcha bien hasta que son atacados por criminales, el padre sobrevive, y con ayuda del brujo mayor del pueblo cobra venganza.

programme.title: Asesinos Sin Ley
programme.desc: Mickey y Jenny son imigrantes indocumentados, un dia el patrón de Jenny trata de abusar de ella, Mickey lo sorprende y lo mata haceindo justicia por su propia mano así se desatan una cacería de criminales abusadores, todo lo sueben a las redes convirtiéndose en los anti-héroes más populares por hacer justicia a los desamparados.

programme.title: Atrapadas En La Duna
programme.desc: En la zona agrícola del Valle de Virú, muchas jovencitas han desaparecido cerca a la carretera. Renato es un chofer con problemas mentales que no supera sus traumas de niñez, un día conoce a Brenda, despertará en él, un amor enfermizo que pronto, lo va a poner al descubierto.

programme.title: Bajo Un Manto De Estrellas
programme.desc: Verano de 1936. El convento dominico de Almagro se vacía en los primeros días del mes de julio. Novicios y estudiantes son enviados a diversos lugares de España para pasarlas vacaciones, reduciéndose así los habitantes del edificio a una veintena de frailes de todas las edades. El 18 de julio el ejército de África se levanta en armas contra el gobierno de la República, lo que supondrá, por las circunstancias políticas del momento, una severa amenaza para los religiosos. En el nerviosismo expectante de los primeros días, la cosa no pasó de visitas molestas e indagaciones suspicaces, pero cuando presenciaron el incendio de la cercana parroquia Madre de Dios, ya no les cupo duda de la tormenta que se cernía sobre sus cabezas.

programme.title: Beber de tu Sangre
programme.desc: Una vampira se enamora de un hombre que conoció en un bar. Un vampiro invita a una mujer embarazada y a sus amigos a ver su obra de teatro. Estos dos vampiros son marido y mujer. Pero Ala ni y Gabriel son una pareja de vampiros aburridos de su larga vida en pareja. Ella decide tener un hijo, pero él no lo desea. Los problemas empiezan cuando Ala ni conoce y se enamora de Javier, pero no sabe que está casado con Lizvet y mucho menos que va a tener un hijo con ella.

programme.title: La Leyenda De La Deseada
programme.desc: Recién llegada a Villaldama, Lizzy, apodada "La Deseada" por su belleza, se enamora de Fernando, un joven humilde. Sus padres la encierran para evitar la relación, mientras Lizzy cae misteriosamente enferma. Elsa, su madre, recurre al Padre Reyes, un sacerdote que deberá enfrentar los oscuros hechizos de Teresa, una mujer obsesionada con Fernando.

programme.title: Gritos del Monday
programme.desc: Un grupo de estudiantes de Ingeniería Ambiental realizan un trabajo en la Reserva Ecológica de los Saltos del Monday, conocido por su rica fauna y su rica historia. Para el trabajo, los alumnos deciden acampar en el lugar, en medio de la obscura noche son sorprendidos por un hecho que desencadenará a lo largo de sus días posteriores, en especial a una de las estudiantes.

programme.title: Los Siete Sellos de la Santa Muerte 2
programme.desc: Después de desmantelar a una poderosa secta los misteriosos crímenes continúan y la policía se dedica a investigar quien es el nuevo líder de la organización para atraparlo y acabar con la violencia.
